message.content:
cs.SY, cs.CE, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.HC 

This paper deals with the interaction between personal comfort systems and centralized HVAC systems in office buildings, which involves control strategies and optimization algorithms. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.SY (Systems and Control), followed by cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also uses Model Predictive Control (MPC) and a bi-linear thermal model, which are common in machine learning and optimization, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) a likely sub-category as well. Finally, the paper addresses the issue of comfort for occupants, which falls under the category of Human-Computer Interaction (HCI), making cs.HC a possible sub-category.
